item.title: Fix macOS Captive WIFI Portal Issue
item.description: I’m not sure if this is just macOS Mojave being flaky or some interaction with the security malware installed on my work laptop, but it refuses to connect to some captive portals.

item.title: Parts list for the ARM cluster
item.description: Realized I forgot to include a parts list for the cluster in my ARM cluster post (all prices are as of March 3rd, 2019), so here we go.

item.title: Getting an ARM kubernetes cluster up and running
item.description: I recently decided to set up a Kubernetes cluster in my basement, partly because I’d never set a cluster up from scratch by myself, and partly because my existing NAS was beginning to run out of headroom.

I’m an SRE in Denver. I like cooking, photography, and working on distributed infrastructure. I’m the organizer for Denver CoffeeOps, which currently meets every Thursday morning from 8am to 10am at the Monk and Mongoose in Greenwood Village near DTC. I have a variety of DevOps (and DevOOPs) themed swag on redbubble, if you’d like to buy something and contribute to my hardware habit, or you can contribute at https://www.patreon.com/unixorn.
Email me at jpb @ unixorn.net. I’m curiousbiped on twitter, unixorn on redbubble and apeseekingknowledge on instagram.
